name: The Ancient Forge
description: A massive forge built into the mountainside, with great bellows and anvils of ancient design
exterior_description: A towering stone structure built directly into the mountainside, with smoke rising from large chimneys and the warm glow of fire visible through the entrance.
purpose: Legendary smithy where magic-infused weapons and armor are crafted
history: Created by the founders of Emberhold to harness the Ember Crystal's power

floors.description: The primary workshop level of the forge

rooms.name: Main Forge Area
rooms.description: The central working area with the Master Anvil and the empty Crystal Mounting

points_of_interest.name: The Master Anvil
points_of_interest.description: An enormous anvil of strange, dark metal at the center of the forge. Runes glow faintly along its sides when the hammer strikes it.

points_of_interest.name: Crystal Mounting
points_of_interest.description: A specially designed holder where the Ember Crystal would normally be placed to power the forge. It's now empty, with only a few glowing embers remaining.

rooms.name: Binding Chamber
rooms.description: A dedicated area for infusing items with elemental magic

points_of_interest.name: Element Binding Circle
points_of_interest.description: A circular area marked with complex runes where items are infused with elemental properties.
